
```{r, echo=FALSE}
textInput("test", "Skriv n책got:")
textOutput("correct")
```

```{r, context="server"}
observeEvent(input$test, {
  if(str_detect(input$test, pattern = "n책got") == TRUE){
  output$correct <- renderText("R채tt svar!")
  }
  else{
    if(input$test == ""){
      output$correct <- renderText("")}
    else{output$correct <- renderText("Nu blev det fel!")}
  }
}
)
```
